metadata.title: CVE-2018-5294 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In libming 0.4.8, there is an integer overflow (caused by an out-of-rangeleft shift) in the readUInt32 function (util/read.c). Remote attackerscould leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via acrafted swf file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
